title: Software Engineer
description: We are looking for a software engineer to join our growing team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining our web applications using modern technologies like React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
requirements: 5+ years of experience with JavaScript, React, Node.js. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
benefits: Health insurance, 401k, flexible work schedule, remote work options

title: Marketing Manager
description: Join our dynamic marketing team as a Marketing Manager. You will lead marketing campaigns and strategies to grow our client base in the Central Valley region.
requirements: 3+ years of marketing experience, knowledge of digital marketing tools, excellent communication skills.
benefits: Health insurance, paid time off, professional development budget

title: Customer Service Representative
description: Provide excellent customer service support to our clients via phone, email, and chat. Handle inquiries, resolve issues, and maintain customer satisfaction in our fast-paced environment.
requirements: High school diploma, excellent communication skills, customer service experience preferred.
benefits: Flexible schedule, training provided, growth opportunities
